name: Soup
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 33 entry that I have done a little bit more work on.

There is no way to win or lose this game, just enjoy being a blob.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - to move
Left Click - to launch blobs (you must pick some up first)
1/2/3/4 - to change graphics mode


Also:

M - to mute the game
P - to pause the game
R - to reset the game

Many thanks to finefin for supplying the awesome music (http://www.finefin.com).
